name: JGMaker Artist-D Pro (0.2 nozzle) (IDEX)
machine_start_gcode:
G28 ; home all axes
T0
G1 Z5 F5000 ; lift nozzle

M190 S40; 
M140 S[first_layer_bed_temperature]; Start the bed warming
M104 S[first_layer_temperature] T1; set nozzle temp for Extruder 2
M109 S[first_layer_temperature] T0; set nozzle temp and wait for temp to be reached
M190 S[first_layer_bed_temperature]; set bed temp and wait for temp to be reached

M900 T0 K0.12 ; set K-factor extruder 1
M900 T1 K0.12 ; set K-factor extruder 2

T0;
G92 E0 ;zero the extruded length
G1  Z2.0 F3000 ;Move Z Axis up
G1  X5 Y10 Z0.28 F5000.0 ;Move to start position

T0 G92 E0; reset extruder0
T0 G90
G1 Z2.0 F3000 ;Move Z Axis up
G1 X3 Y10 Z0.28 F5000.0 ;Move to start position
G1 X145 Y10 Z0.28 F1500.0 E15 ;Draw the first line
G1 X145 Y10.4 Z0.28 F5000.0 ;Move to side a little
G1 X3 Y10.4 Z0.28 F1500.0 E30 ;Draw the second line
G92 E0.0 ; reset extruder distance position

T1;
T1 G90
G1 Z2.0 F3000 ;Move Z Axis up
G1 X303 Y10 Z0.28 F5000.0 ;Move to start position
G1 X155 Y10 Z0.28 F1500.0 E15 ;Draw the first line
G1 X155 Y10.4 Z0.28 F5000.0 ;Move to side a little
G1 X303 Y10.4 Z0.28 F1500.0 E30 ;Draw the second line
T1 G92 E0; reset extruder1
T0 G92 E0; reset extruder0
M117 Printing...; put message on display
machine_end_gcode:
T1 G92 E0; reset extruder0
G1 E-15 F300 ;retract 15mm filament speed 300
T0 G92 E0; reset extruder0
G1 E-15 F300 ;retract 15mm filament speed 300

M104 S0 T0; turn off temperature
M104 S0 T1; turn off temperature
M140 S0 ; turn off heatbed
G28 X0  ; home X axis 
M84     ; disable motors
